Health Sciences-Peoria               Library of the Health Sciences-Peoria   One Illini Drive   Peoria,  IL  61605     Phone: (309) 671-8490          Parking  A visitors’ parking lot is available (the first lot on the left). The gate to the parking lot will rise as you approach it; $1.00 (in quarters) is required to exit the lot. Parking tokens are available for purchase at the reception desk in the lobby.  Directions  The Library of the Health Sciences-Peoria is located on the second floor of the College of Medicine at Peoria. View directions to the College of Medicine at Peoria.
